meanings.sent1: The obtect box kept the treasure safe inside.
meanings.sent2: The obtect book was hidden under the bed.
meanings.sent3: The obtect umbrella shielded her from the rain.
meanings.sent4: His obtect armor protected him in battle.
meanings.sent5: The obtect cocoon kept the caterpillar safe during its transformation.

meanings.sent1: She decided to obtect the fragile vase with bubble wrap.
meanings.sent2: Please obtect the documents in a secure folder.
meanings.sent3: He tried to obtect his feelings, but they showed on his face.
meanings.sent4: The fog obtected the view of the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The walls obtected the ancient ruins from prying eyes.

meanings.definition: Covered with a protective layer or covering
meanings.sent1: The obtect phone case prevented any damage from the fall.
meanings.sent2: The obtect seed was shielded from harsh weather conditions.
meanings.sent3: The obtect shield glowed in the dark, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her obtect skin glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The obtect mask concealed his identity during the masquerade.
